content.description: Basicly 5.4 through out.  Easy way to the top.  Good beginner lead.
content.protection: Two bolts, no other gear.  Two bolt anchor at top.
content.location:
8-10 feet left of

Black Hole

into a slot or chimney of rock.  On a west-facing, black-grey groove under two bolts.  Rap to base.

content.description: Crux is 15 feet off the ground, protected by a lone bolt.  Earl crux with 5.4 cruising above to the bolts.  good access to TR other routes.
content.protection: 1 bolt 15 feet up with cams to 1 1/2 inches.  run out above the bolt on easy ground.  2 bolt anchor.
content.location: Route is on the south east section of the rock just prior to a small corridor of rocks, look for the bolt.

content.description: Crux is a slabby move on the lower section before it goes vertical.
content.protection: 4 bolts and 1 1.5 inch cam for the crack at the bottom of the vertical section.  2 bolt anchor.
content.location: 2/3 of the way up the ridge on the north side.  steep slab to a vertical finish.  Rap off.

content.description: Crux is a slabby move at the beginning and a short steep section near the top.
content.location: South side 2/3 up the ridge.  Tallest section. Very low angle slab at bottom just left of a 6 inch water groove.  Rap off or set up TR for Climb on north side of rock.

content.description: 30 feet left of thunder dome.  Start under a shallow scoop right of first bolt and go up left.  Crux is the move off the ground with a 5.9 move shortly after.
content.protection: One bolt and cams 1/2" to 1 1/2".  2 bolt anchor at top.
content.location:
30 feel left of

Thunder Dome

on south side of formation.  Route is at the beginning of a narrow slot running north in the formation.

climbs.name: Between a Rock and an Easy Place.

content.description: Crux is at second bolt.  Fun, Monastery-type climbing, almost vertical at the beginning to a lower-angle runout (5.4).  Another good beginner lead.
content.protection: 2 bolts, no other gear.  Two bolt anchor.
content.location:
Farthest route up the slot under two bolts on a west-facing wall.  10 feet left of

Two to Tango

.  Two bolt anchor.
